Text: One of the best zombie movies ever! Good soundtrack too.
het zijn geen zombies het blijven mensen maar ze zijn wel besmet en moordlustig:) maar idd zonder twijfel een van de beste films op deze aardbol

28 days/weeks later is not tecnically a zombie movie :p

The "zombies" are not living dead as zombies are, but they are infected with a virus causing them to go insane or something, apparently giving them superhuman strength and endurance.

i thought 28 Days Later was a little better, but for the second time around it was still the best zombie movie series ever.
